title: 142: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 2 (Cringing in Guitar Center)
itunes:title: 142: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 2 (Cringing in Guitar Center)
description:
It’s the second episode of Listen To Your Hearts and, let’s be honest, the cringe is starting to emerge…and we love it! The Broads start with some Bach Nation coverage and then dive into week 2 of LTYH and discuss the whack dates, Trevor drama, the Sher Bear betrayl, everyone obsessing over Brandon, Chris & Bri, speaking the language of song, LOUD kissing, Mel’s flirting, and much more! 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** EVERLYWELL: For 20% off an at home lab test visit http://everlywell.com/chatty and enter code CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
